content.label: It has all the features that I ever need.
I‚Äôm addicted to my audiobooks!!!  Hoping there‚Äôs an update coming soon. It‚Äôs kinda acting up since the IOS 12 update.

I have been using this app for quite some time and have a sizable library. We have not had problems and in fact had to download a book from here after failure in another well known app. I would recommend it

I‚Äôve tried several audio book apps.  This one has worked the best for me.  ‚ô•Ô∏è.  
Only small bump - need to use the link in email (or log in to the website) for new purchases to get your deals.  The books load directly to the app.   Happy listening üëëüêù

I am not a real book reader as a hobby, but since I‚Äôve started using this Audiobook app, I absolutely love listening to the great variety of books offered by this app. A ton of worthwhile public domain books I recommend, also the books you can purchase stay very up to date. There are a few glitches, but besides that, the manage library function is good, as well as the search areas. Wish listing is nice as well. Thank you for such a cool app!

title.label: Not that special sorry to say

content.label:
I want to say I was impressed with the Public Domain books available for free.
I knew this was not the cheapest app available but thought it might be a decent app maybe even Special, but not that special. I am disabled, having nerve damage in both hands and issues with my vision as well and reading became something I was missing and thought it would be a wonderful thing to have books back in my life.

I use this app on an iPhone and have difficulty with the sleep function and as I have read from others at any time it just skips forward in the book while listening. The tracking bar doesn‚Äôt always sync up with the actual book and it too skips to catch up. I have had it reading from multiple points in the story for this issue I typically just restart my phone.
Unfortunately I purchased a fair number of books before learning of these issues.
If they could fix this it might be special as I had hoped.

I would give it no stars if possible. Books stop in the middle of tracks and sometimes won‚Äôt play at all. Randomly, a downloaded book will only play by streaming online. This app is absolutely awful.

So I'm listening to a book and there are SO many issues with the playback... first of all it's not that great of a design, not super intuitive but that's not my complaint. My complaint is that while listening to the book it has so many issues playing. Very often it will pause randomly for no reason. Half the time it does not automatically go onto the next track and I have to do it manually. It even SKIPS AROUND and I have to go back so I don't miss parts of the book and I've resorted to watching the bar as I listen to it which defeats the point of having an app for it. The controls are also very delayed and don't work well with iOS because half the time it doesn't respond to control center buttons or is super delayed. At one point it even started playing the book at 3 different points at once! I had to pause it in the app, pause it in control center and one voice was still going so I had to restart the whole app... unbelievably difficult! I suggest using scribd because they are cheaper and have a better app. (Not that this app is setting that high of a bar anyway)
Great app for me

The membership offers you 50% off pricing which ideally would be nice but their books are priced high. For example, an audio book I was wanting was regularly priced at $20 on Amazon. Audiobooks now ‚Äú50% off‚Äù price for the same book is $15.99, added to their $5 monthly fee, you‚Äôd be paying more than buying on Amazon. No thanks.
It needs 3X playback. I listen to books fast!

I have been very satisfied with all of my purchases.  I did however have a problem once and it was rectified quite quickly.   I would have given 5 stars, but I feel that the prices are a bit high for some of the books.
Love the app.  I listen to a lot of books
Great app. Love the discounts.

You have the option to stream or download your content depending on your situation. 
Well worth the download to manage your library.

If I could give it zero stars I would, it doesn‚Äôt have anything I‚Äôm looking for. I just want to be able to sit and listen while doing, something but I can‚Äôt find any of the books I want. stupid effing thing don‚Äôt buy it.
I absolutely love this app I have about 50 books that I can listen I love this and would recommend it to anyone
I‚Äôve been using the app for about 6 months now and really like it.  I listen to books while working or doing yard work and it really makes the time fly.  Good prices and discounts each month.

This site works very easily and smoothly. There is a great selection of book!
milliefaye
Out of all the sites I‚Äôve tried, this one has so much more to enjoy and always very affordable! Love love love
This app is so great for me - so many audiobooks, even ones I would never even think to look for!  Customer service has always been very helpful.
Good app, prices don‚Äôt match the site. Is that something that someone is working on updating?

OMG!üò± $26 for ‚ÄúWoman in the window‚Äù?! NO THANK YOU.
Deleting app now.üò°üëéüèª

There are a couple very basic things this app doesn‚Äôt do:  When typing to search for a title, etc. there is no cursor/bar to show you where you‚Äôre typing.  And when you open the app, it defaults to book titles, instead of ‚Äúmy library,‚Äù which seems to be the logical screen to default to.  

Also it pauses when you go to do things like Google, when there is no reason to pause.  And when you search for a book that isn‚Äôt available, you just get a plain white screen, as opposed to a message.

The membership is less, but I prefer Audible.
Love it. If you can have a better library and prices a bit cheaper this app will be the best. Thanks
This app works pretty well, but is not quite as seamless as I‚Äôd like it to be. I do really like the 30 second forward and back buttons. Good app with good potential.
This is a wonderful App! Easy to use! Love for my commute to work!!!
Great app. Good selections c
I love this app! I listen to it all day work and while driving in the car!
I'm a huge fan of audiobooks, and this has been a great app to use. I especially like that you can speed up or slow down the rate that the book is read. A very user-friendly app!
This is a great app. Has variety of horror which is all that I like at great prices.

title.label: Great for traveling and going overseas

content.label: I downloaded this app for the purpose of downloading new books for my travels.  I‚Äôm now even using it to keep up with my monthly book club picks.  Love it!

Love good books but don‚Äôt always have the time to sit and read , but this is the best way to enjoy my books and still get things done . Good books Great prices . Easy to use . Thanks for a wonderful product . I just bought a new iPad and my books transferred easily, what a blessing.

Love to read just do not have the time.  
Get to listen and cook dinner wash dishes. Just love it. If there was anything had to say they was not great is if you stop or pause the book, it‚Äôs not there when you come back. You have to click on it then go back to library find your book click on it the. Hit play. That bugs me. Other then that it‚Äôs great.

Ok but not great selection of content. 

Ok price.

Almost ok iOS app.

I would recommend this app to a friend, but I would add that it is fra from perfect.

Not only is this a great app, AudiobooksNow offers a great selection at great prices. To get the best prices you'll want to make your purchases from their website and use the app to listen to your books. That's because Apple takes a cut when you purchase through the app.

I got this because I only occasionally need to get an audio book. I didn't want a subscription model. I just downloaded a book at home before leaving for a trip through eastern Oregon and Nevada, where there is scant cell coverage, so no Internet. If I stopped the app for any reason, I needed to have Internet access to get to the library where the info for the book was stored. As a result, I went without my downloaded book for periods of time. The book itself played fine once the library was accessed...no need for Internet. Not particularly useful in a world where Internet coverage isn't universal.

Update: see developer response below. The app is fine... will try it again on another trip. If it works without Internet, it's exactly what I wanted!

I love listening to audio books and this company has a large selection, but the app is very basic, quite buggy and not user-friendly. Tech support was friendly and quick, but they can't fix the software. I'll stick with the app because of their books, but I hope they'll put more effort into the app.

title.label: Overpriced, discriminates against in-app purchcases, and poor customer service

content.label: I downloaded a book from audiobooksnow thinking I would get the new member discount advertised when I signed up with this outfit.  Instead, they charged me full price.  When I complained, they explained that, had I purchased the book on the web and then downloaded it to my phone it would have received the 50% discount, but because I purchased it through the app I paid full price.  The reason?  Apple charges them for in-app purchases.  I cancelled my membership and now the book that I PURCHASED is gone.  Stick with the reputable companies selling audio books!

This the worst club i've ever joined. Last Mo I signed in for free trial, and couldn't get to the audio books I could never pull any up. So I forgot about it until $19.99 was taken from my acct. I called CS the girl was very rude, I asked for a manager. She told she would submit a request for a refund. Now 2wks later still no $. I called back and was told they denied my refund. I ask for manager again this time they said I download a book call the holy war. I advised her did no such thing.  The only reading I do is my Bible but I do listen to books on audio. Mgr, said she would request again to billing department, I asked to speak to someone there, I was told this is an online book club.  They don't have a department where there is actual people to talk to.
    So this is why I'm writing this review. If I could I would highlight just a tip of the star.
It has some sound bugs. It pauses while listening.
Very expensive

Love this app.  Very easy to use.  Great selection of audiobooks.  There are free classics and good prices for new releases.  Awesome!!  The one thing I would like to see added is the price of the audiobook on the main page instead of having to go to the next page.

title.label: Better than other paying audiobook apps!

content.label:
I love this app.  Easy to use , wide variety of selection. 

A couple of APP and Website addition suggestions though: 

1-add a wish list for books we want to purchase.  
2- the books we purchase and download to app need to have an option to download portions at a time for those with limited space.  - this is almost a deal breaker.  You can download portions on a computer but not on the app.   Also be able to delete those portions after listening and then download the ones ahead.  

Thanks for your consideration.    

I use Overdrive a LOT and would use yours more and purchase more if there were similar functionalities.   

Sincerely, 
Meredith
Absolutely amazing! I love to listen while I'm at work and riding in the car. Very wide selection of books.

I absolutely love the audiobooksnow, I have probably ordered 40 books, at least and if I ever have a problem they fix the problem ASAP! If I ever want to return an audiobook they refund the money immediately. Their customer service is awesome!! When you send an email you get one back right away!! I will never use another audiobook app!! üíú‚ù§Ô∏è
I love this app. Easy to get around and find what I am looking for. A must have for book lovers to keep up with the latest and greatest, best selling novels. Thumbs up Audio Books Now!!
This is a great audiobooks app.  Clean and simple, it works great!

Too expensive $38.99 for one Outlander Series book! That's insane!!! How is this affordable?? Disappointed. Email stated 30 free trial, also stated prices lower then store books. I must be missing something because this is t right.

Anytime, anywhere!
This app is very good and useful for my life!
There are many great titles to choose from!
I liked the design!
Congratulations!
It's great!! :))
